name: 0.39.0 (21-Sep-2022)
body: * Feature: Support global.conf (#608)

name: 0.38.1 (01-Sep-2022)
body: * Fix: When using Docker, only pass a build profile if it has been explicitly specified (#604)

name: 0.38.0 (30-Mar-2022)
body:
* Feature: Added support for require override (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/597)
* Fix: msvc versions follow current Conan versions (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/600)

name: 0.37.0 (03-Nov-2021)
body:
* Feature: Add msvc compiler support (#586)
* Feature: Feature: Pure C can be passed by environment variable (#587)
* Fix: Read CONAN_USE_DOCKER is read as a string (#579)
* Fix: Build profile environment variable is incorrectly named (#585)
* Fix: Base profile is read from local file system before installing the conan config (#583)

name: 0.36.0 (22-Sep-2021)
body:
* Feature: Add support for build profile (#555)
* Feature: Add a TOC to README.md (#562)
* Fix: split stable_branch_pattern argument like is done for the env var (#577)
* Fix: Update package references to Conan Center (#578)
* Fix: Regex patterns and move initialization to init method (#558)

name: 0.35.1 (09-Apr-2021)
body:
- Fix: Config URL should run before loading profiles (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/553)
- Fix: Fix empty username on Docker (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/552)
- Fix: pyreq_loader requires Conan 1.21.0 or higher (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/551)
- Fix: Force package upload for all Conan versions (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/548)
- Fix: Remove Carriage Returns in text that is encoded in env variables (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/545)

name: 0.35.0 (03-Dec-2020)
body:

- Fix: Rename legacy folder conan to avoid import error with Conan 1.32. (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/538)
- Fix: Fixes the issue with sensitive details are exposed in build log files (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/536)

body: - Bugfix: CPT accepts Conan 1.23.0 as workable version (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/485)

body:

name: 0.30.4 (10-Dec-2019)
body: - Feature: Conan 1.21 compatibility. (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/435)

name: 0.30.1 (05-Nov-2019)

name: 0.30.0 (04-Nov-2019)
body:
- Feature: Compatibility with Conan 1.20
- Feature: Enable not exporting package recipe (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/415)
- Feature: Add support of --args option when using "conan config install" feature (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/413)
- Feature: Add compiler.cppstd as external setting (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/406)
- Feature: Update package dependencies by --update argument (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/402)
- Feature: Fix CircleCI pull request detection. (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/401)
- Feature: Use numbered jobs (#395) (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/396)
- Fix: The reference parameter is parsed in order to retrieve the name (used to compute the shared option name if not set). (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/421)
- Fix: Validate Docker image for shell command (#376) (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/405)

name: 0.25.1 (30-Mar-2019)

name: 0.25.0 (29-Mar-2019)
body:
- Feature: Support custom Conanfile path (#354) (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/357)
- Feature: Add Code Coverage support on Codecov.io (#351) (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/350)
- Feature: Upload only the Conan recipe (#153) (#25) (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/348)
- Feature: Customize pip command name (#147) (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/347)
- Feature: Call login method from ConanMultiPackager (#336) (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/344)
- Feature: Forward arguments to Docker run command (#310) (#277) (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/343)
- Feature: Upload built missing dependencies (#237) (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/334)
- Fix: Parse the env var CONAN_SKIP_CHECK_CREDENTIALS as boolean (#355) (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/356)
- Bugfix: Fix Azure DevOps branch name (#346) (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/346)

name: 0.24.0 (7-March-2019)
body:
- Feature: Compatibility with Conan 1.13 (#341)
- Feature: Support Shippable CI (#337)
- Feature: Support Azure DevOps (#335)
- Fix: Use the correct build path to load Conan class (#325)
- Fix: Remove extra python requirements (#328)

name: 0.23.0 (31-Jan-2019)
body:
- Feature: Compatibility with Conan 1.12
- Feature: Tags can be used to upload to the `stable` channel (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/315)
- Feature: CI manager can now read a commit from a repository (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/316/)
- Feature: Now the user home can be specified for docker images different from the provided by `conanio/*`(https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/318)
- Fix: Fixed PyOpenSSL dependency has been pinned to match the required by Conan, also upgraded. (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/319)
- Fix: Now Bamboo env vars with different casing are supported (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/322)

name: 0.22.3 (2-Jan-2019)
body: - Fixed compatibility with Conan 1.11

name: 0.22.2  (19-Dec-2018)
body: - Compatibility with Conan 1.11

name: 0.21.1 (4-Dec-2018)
body: - Fixed several bugs operating with Conan 1.10.0
- Adjusted compatibility to Conan 1.10.0

name: 0.20.2 (5-Nov-2018)
body:
0.20.2 
=====

- Bugfix: Fixed bug with the `remove_build_if` feature. https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/296

name: 0.20.1 (2-Nov-2018)
body:
- Fix: Config install running also inside the docker containers. (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/294)
- Bugfix: Fix a test failure (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/294)

name: 0.20.0 (2-Nov-2018)
body:
- Feature: Support for `Visual Studio toolsets` (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/291)
- Feature: Added support for [ConanInvalidConfiguration](https://docs.conan.io/en/latest/reference/conanfile/methods.html?#invalid-configuration) so when a recipe declares that a configuration is not supported, CPT will print a warning but will skip that configuration (without raising any error). (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/290)
- Feature: Checks that the installed Conan client version is supported and raise an exception otherwise. (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/289)
- Feature: Updated defaulted versions of every compiler. (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/285)
- Feature: New `remove_build_if` and `update_build_if` helper methods to filter/update existing builds. (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/272)
- Feature: Added `CONAN_PIP_INSTALL` to install additional pip packages. (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/271)
- Feature: Run `conan config install` before the build by `config_url` argument or `CONAN_CONFIG_URL` env var (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/268)
- Fix: Only try to upload packages that have been built. (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/284)
- Fix: Renamed docker images to use the new ones from conan.io namespace (https://github.com/conan-io/conan-package-tools/pull/276)

name: 0.19.9 (30-Oct-2018)
body: - Ready to work with Conan 1.9

name: 0.19.8 (19-Oct-2018)
body:
0.19.8 
====

- Bugfix: With the new python 3 images for `conan-docker-tools` no sudo is used inside the container because using `pyenv` it is not needed.

name: 0.19.7 (17-Oct-2018)
body: - Bugfix: Changed upload policy using Conan 1.8 to avoid try to upload a `conanmanifest.txt` file when only the timestamp is changing, causing issues for a repository without overwriting permissions. https://github.com/conan-io/conan/issues/3732#issuecomment-429907367

name: 0.19.6 (15-Oct-2018)
body: - Fix: Discard only spaces env var values.

name: 0.19.5 (15-Oct-2018)
body: - Fix: An empty env var like `CONAN_GCC_VERSIONS` means "no gcc versions", if the variable is not defined, it will use default gcc versions. The same for the rest of default configuration environment variables.

name: 0.19.4 (9-Oct-2018)
body: - Feature: Compatibility with Conan 1.8.X

name: 0.19.3 (26-Sept-2018)
body:
- Feature: ``CONAN_IGNORE_SKIP_CI`` env var to ignore the ``[skip_ci]`` commit message.
- Bugfix: For a package with dependencies the upload was failing because of taking the first installed binary package instead of the first binary package for the created package.

name: 0.19.2 (12-Sept-2018)
body:
- Upload restricted to created packages.
- Quoted `-v` in docker command
- Added tests

name: 0.19.1 (6-Sep-2018)
body: - Bugfix: The conanfile.py is now loaded using the loader from the conan_api to avoid errors when using python requires.

name: 0.19.0 (5-Sep-2018)
body: - Feature: Build types 'RelWithDebInfo', 'MinSizeRel' support for Visual Studio. Thanks to @birsoyo

name: 0.18.7 (5-Sep-2018)
body: - Fixed bug with recipes using new python requires failing while parsing the conanfile class.

name: 0.18.5 (28-Aug-2018)
body: - Compatibility with Conan 1.7.0

name: 0.18.1 (14-June-2018)
body: - Fix: Forced `idna==2.6` to avoid unknown issues in OSX with pip installing `2.7`.

name: 0.18.0 (13-June-2018)
body:
0.18.0
====

- Feature: Support for docker windows containers (thanks @solvingj)
- Feature: Custom test folder can be specified in case "test_package" folder is not in the same folder than conanfile.py (thanks @uilianries)

name: 0.17.4 (19-May-2018)
body: - de-prefix the bamboo env vars prefixed with `bamboo.` to be able to use them as regular named environment variables.

name: 0.17.1 (4-May-2018)
body:
- Bugix: Upload remote was not passed to docker container when using the "upload" parameter instead of `CONAN_UPLOAD` environment variable.
- Feature: Printed in a table the parameters of the invocation of `conan create` for debugging purpose.

name: 0.17.0 (4-May-2018)
body:
0.17.0
====

- The filesystem is not shared anymore with the docker containers, every container will upload their own packages/recipe, so it is not needed to share the conan home. The remotes and all the needed configuration is passed as environment variables.
- The `shared_option_name` of the ``add_common_builds`` is now automatically managed when the recipe contains a `shared` option.
- Better `remotes` configuration, supporting remote naming and use SSL parameter.
    - As a parameter of `ConanMultiPackager`, remotes can be a list of strings separated by `,` of a tuple containing `URL`, `use ssl` and `remote name`:
   ```
       remotes = "https://api.bintray.com/conan/conan-community/conan,https://api.bintray.com/conan/other/conan2"
       remotes = [("https://api.bintray.com/conan/conan-community/conan", True, "remote1"), 
                       ("https://api.bintray.com/conan/other/conan2", False, "remote2")]
   ```
   - As environment variable:
     ```
      CONAN_REMOTES="url1@True@remote_name, url2@False@remote_name2"
     ```
   The same is valid for `CONAN_UPLOAD`/`upload`.
- Feature: If the remote (both upload remote or remotes in general) exists in the current installation with the same URL it will be kept and the current remote name will be used.
- Improvements in the login/password at remote level:
   `login_username="my_user"`
   `login_username = {"remote1": "my_user", "my_artifactory": "other_user"}`
- New parameter: **always_update_conan_in_docker**, when True "conan package tools" and "conan" will be installed and upgraded in the docker image in every build execution (and the docker image commit will be skipped)
- Conan package tools calling directly the `conan python api`.
- Docker use of `CONAN_TEMP_TEST_FOLDER` to avoid creating the builds in the `test_package` folder in case of a local usage of conan package tools.
- General code refactor, reducing technical debt, significantly increased of the test suite.
- Introduced "master", "release*" and "stable*" as default patterns to match with the current branch and use "stable" channel.
- Introduced env var to help with #184 recognizing the create.
- Cool docker ASCII art.

name: 0.17.0-beta3 (26-Apr-2018)
body:
0.17.0-beta3
=========

- Refactored profile code.
- Fixed issue with build policies.
- Introduced env var to help with #184 recognizing the create.
- Cool docker asscii art.

name: 0.17.0-beta2
body:
- Reverted **CONAN_DOCKER_USE_SUDO** and introduced **CONAN_PIP_USE_SUDO**
- Fixed bug related to the exports and exports sources in the conan create command
- Fixed bug with already existing remote names with different URL
- Improved test suite
- Introduced "master", "release*" and "stable*" as default patterns to match with the current branch and use "stable" channel.

Try it: `pip install conan-package-tools==0.17.0.b2`

name: 0.17.0-beta1
body:
0.17.0-beta1 (24-Apr-2018)
====================

- The filesystem is not shared anymore with the docker containers, every container will upload their own packages/recipe, so it is not needed to share the conan home. The remotes and all the needed configuration is passed as environment variables.
- The `shared_option_name` of the ``add_common_builds`` is now automatically managed when the recipe contains a `shared` option.
- Better `remotes` configuration, supporting remote naming and use SSL parameter.
    - As parameter of `ConanMultiPackager`, remotes can be a list of strings separated by `,` of a tuple containing `URL`, `use ssl` and `remote name`:
   ```
       remotes = "https://api.bintray.com/conan/conan-community/conan,https://api.bintray.com/conan/other/conan2"
       remotes = [("https://api.bintray.com/conan/conan-community/conan", True, "remote1"), 
                       ("https://api.bintray.com/conan/other/conan2", False, "remote2")]
   ```
   - As environment variable:
     ```
      CONAN_REMOTES="url1@True@remote_name, url2@False@remote_name2"
     ```
   The same is valid for `CONAN_UPLOAD`/`upload`.
- Feature: If the remote (both upload remote or remotes in general) exists in the current installation with the same URL it will be kept and the current remote name will be used.
- Improvements in the login/password at remote level:
   `login_username="my_user"`
   `login_username = {"remote1": "my_user", "my_artifactory": "other_user"}`
- New parameter: **always_update_conan_in_docker**, when True "conan package tools" and "conan" will be installed and upgraded in the docker image in every build execution (and the docker image commit will be skipped)
- Conan package tools calling directly the `conan python api`.
- The "pip install" invocation takes into account the `CONAN_DOCKER_USE_SUDO` to use sudo or not.
- Docker use of `CONAN_TEMP_TEST_FOLDER` to avoid creating the builds in the `test_package` folder in case of a local usage of conan package tools.
- General code refactor, reducing technical debt, significant increased of the test suite.

name: 0.5.4 (8-Aug-2017)
body:
- Using new mingw-installer package from conan-center.
- Using new option for mingw allowing the shared option
- Skip compiler check if detected CC or CXX.

- Support for environment variables and build_requires
- Refactored code, more modular and better maintenance.
- Improved testing
- Better traces
